title: The Deserted Road: The Wandering Eyes - The Complete Series
description: The complete Series 1 (Volumes 1-5) for "The Deserted The Wandering Eyes." Read the story from the first Act, to the last Act and watch it as it unfolds, along the way about how and what things happened to the McKinley family and the unbearable pain and torture they went through and suffered. Will the pain they endure ever stop? Or will it continue to haunt them, for the rest of their life?
author: Jason Patrick Perry
